TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi Xml extends System.Web.UI.Control

summary.span: 显示 XML 文档，不进行格式化或使用可扩展样式表语言转换 (XSLT)。

span.span: Displays an XML document without formatting or using Extensible Stylesheet Language Transformations (XSLT).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [指定 XML 数据Specifying XML Data](#specifying_xml_data) - [指定 XSL 转换Specifying an XSL Transformation](#specifying_an_xsl_transformation) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 使用控件来显示 XML 文档的内容不进行格式化或使用 XSL 转换。Use the control to display the contents of an XML document without formatting or using XSL Transformations. ## 指定 XML 数据Specifying XML Data 通过设置三个属性之一指定要显示的 XML 文档。The XML document to display is specified by setting one of three properties. 这三个属性表示可以显示的 XML 文档的不同类型。These three properties represent the different types of XML documents that can be displayed. 可以显示，XML 字符串或通过设置适当的属性的 XML 文件。You can display a , an XML string, or an XML file by setting the appropriate property. 下表列出用于指定 XML 文档的属性。The following table lists the properties for specifying the XML document. |PropertyProperty|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||设置 XML 文档使用对象。Sets the XML document using a object. **警告：** 此属性已过时。**Warning:** This property is obsolete. 使用其他属性之一设置 XML 内容的此部分中列出控件。Use one of the other properties listed in this section to set the XML content for the control.| ||设置使用字符串的 XML 文档。Sets the XML document using a string. **注意：** 通常通过将放置到开始和结束之间的文本以声明方式设置此属性``标记控件。**Note:** This property is commonly set declaratively by placing text between the opening and closing `` tags of the control.| ||设置使用文件的 XML 文档。Sets the XML document using a file.| > [!NOTE] > 至少一个 XML 文档属性必须设置为显示 XML 文档。At least one of the XML document properties must be set to display an XML document. 如果设置了多个 XML 文档属性，将显示最后设置的属性中引用的 XML 文档。If more than one XML document property is set, the XML document referenced in the last property set is displayed. 其他属性中的文档将被忽略。The documents in the other properties are ignored. ## 指定 XSL 转换Specifying an XSL Transformation 你可以选择指定 XML 文档之前它由两个属性之一设置写入到输出流格式化 XSL 转换 (XSLT) 样式表。You can optionally specify an XSL Transformation (XSLT) style sheet that formats the XML document before it is written to the output stream by setting one of two properties. 这两个属性表示不同类型的可用于格式化 XML 文档的 XSL 转换样式表。The two properties represent the different types of XSL Transformation style sheets that can be used to format the XML document. 你可以设置的格式与 XML 文档对象或使用 XSL 转换设置样式表文件设置适当的属性。You can format the XML document with a object or with an XSL Transformation style sheet file by setting the appropriate property. 如果指定 XSL 转换的样式表，则使用默认格式显示 XML 文档。If no XSL Transformation style sheet is specified, the XML document is displayed using the default format. 下表列出用于指定一个 XSL 转换样式表的属性。The following table lists the properties for specifying an XSL Transformation style sheet. |PropertyProperty|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||使用指定 XML 文档进行格式化对象。Formats the XML document using the specified object. **注意：** 使用对象需要`Full Trust`权限。**Note:** Using a object requires `Full Trust` permissions.| ||使用指定的 XSL 转换样式表文件的 XML 文档的格式。Formats the XML document using the specified XSL Transformation style sheet file.| > [!NOTE] > XSL 转换样式表是可选的。The XSL Transformation style sheet is optional. 不需要设置或属性。You do not need to set the or the property. 如果这两个 XSL 转换样式表属性的设置，最后设置的属性将确定哪些 XSL 转换样式表用于格式化 XML 文档。If both XSL Transformation style sheet properties are set, the last property set determines which XSL Transformation style sheet is used to format the XML document. 将忽略其他属性。The other property is ignored. 类还提供了属性，使你可以使用可选的自变量提供的 XSL 转换样式表。The class also provides the property, which enables you to provide the XSL Transformation style sheet with optional arguments. 参数可以是 XSL 转换 (XSLT) 参数或扩展对象。The arguments can be either XSL Transformations (XSLT) parameters or extension objects. ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建和来自示例 XML 文件和一个 XSL 转换样式表的对象。The following code example shows how to create and objects from a sample XML file and an XSL Transformation style sheet. 对象然后由 XML 控件用于显示 XML 文档。The objects are then used by the XML control to display the XML document. [!code-aspx-csharp[XmlClassExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/XmlClassExample/CS/xmlcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[XmlClassExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/XmlClassExample/VB/xmlvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性已过时。The property is obsolete. 若要指定的 XML，将显示在控制，请使用属性或属性。To specify the XML that will be displayed in the control, use the property or the property. 有关这些替代项的详细信息，请参阅类概述控件。For more information about these alternatives, see the class overview for the control. 要在中显示的 XML 文档控件三种方式之一中指定。The XML document to display in the control is specified in one of three ways. 你可以指定对象、 一个 XML 字符串或通过设置适当的属性的 XML 文件。You can specify a object, an XML string, or an XML file by setting the appropriate property. 属性用于指定（表示 XML 文档） 控件中显示。The property is used to specify a (representing an XML document) to display in the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建和来自示例 XML 文件和一个 XSL 转换样式表的对象。The following code example shows how to create and objects from a sample XML file and an XSL Transformation style sheet. 对象然后由 XML 控件用于显示 XML 文档。The objects are then used by the XML control to display the XML document. [!code-aspx-csharp[XmlClassExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/XmlClassExample/CS/xmlcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[XmlClassExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/XmlClassExample/VB/xmlvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 设置包含要在 控件中显示的 XML 文档的字符串。

span.span: Sets a string that contains the XML document to display in the control.

value.span: 包含要在 控件中显示的 XML 文档的字符串。

span.span: A string that contains the XML document to display in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 要在中显示的 XML 文档控件三种方式之一中指定。The XML document to display in the control is specified in one of three ways. 你可以指定对象、 一个 XML 字符串或通过设置适当的属性的 XML 文件。You can specify a object, an XML string, or an XML file by setting the appropriate property. 属性用于指定 （表示 XML 文档） 的 XML 字符串在控件中显示。The property is used to specify an XML string (representing an XML document) to display in the control. 属性通常不是以编程方式设置，或者设置为该控件的属性。The property is not typically programmatically set, or set as an attribute of the control. 相反，XML 字符串是通常以声明方式设置放置到开始和结束之间的文本``的控件的标记。Instead, the XML string is usually set declaratively by placing text between the opening and closing `` tags of the control. > [!NOTE] > 尽管属性同时包含`get`和`set`访问器，仅`set`访问器非常有用。Although the property contains both `get` and `set` accessors, only the `set` accessor is useful. 如果你使用`get`访问器，返回。If you use the `get` accessor, is returned.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DocumentSource { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置要在 控件中显示的 XML 文档的路径。

span.span: Gets or sets the path to an XML document to display in the control.

value.span: 要在 控件中显示的 XML 文档的路径。

span.span: The path to an XML document to display in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 要在中显示的 XML 文档控件三种方式之一中指定。The XML document to display in the control is specified in one of three ways. 你可以指定对象、 一个 XML 字符串或通过设置适当的属性的 XML 文件。You can specify a object, an XML string, or an XML file by setting the appropriate property. 属性用于指定 XML 文件 （表示 XML 文档） 的路径在控件中显示。The property is used to specify the path to an XML file (representing an XML document) to display in the control. 你可以使用相对或绝对路径。You can use a relative or an absolute path. 相对路径而无需指定完整路径在服务器上相关的 Web 窗体页或用户控件的位置的文件的位置。A relative path relates the location of the file to the location of the Web Forms page or user control, without specifying a complete path on the server. 该路径是相对 Web 页的位置。The path is relative to the location of the Web page. 这使得更轻松地移动整个站点到另一个目录服务器上而无需更新到代码中的文件的路径。This makes it easier to move the entire site to another directory on the server without updating the path to the file in code. 绝对路径提供的完整路径，因此将站点移动到另一个目录时需要更新代码。An absolute path provides the complete path, so moving the site to another directory requires updating the code. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何显示 XML 文档中使用 XSL 转换中控件。The following code example shows how to display an XML document using an XSL Transform in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[XmlControlClassExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/XmlControlClassExample/CS/xmlcontrolcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[XmlControlClassExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/XmlControlClassExample/VB/xmlcontrolvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置 对象，它在 XML 文档被写入输出流之前对其进行格式化。

span.span: Gets or sets the object that formats the XML document before it is written to the output stream.

value.span: 在 XML 文档写入输出流之前对其进行格式化的 。

span.span: The that formats the XML document before it is written to the output stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用时控件显示的 XML 文档，你可以选择指定之前对写入到输出流中两种方式之一进行格式化 XML 文档中，可扩展样式表语言转换 (XSLT) 样式表。When using the control to display an XML document, you can optionally specify an Extensible Stylesheet Language Transformation (XSLT) style sheet that formats the XML document, before it is written to the output stream in one of two ways. 你可以设置使用的 XML 文档的格式对象或 XSL 转换样式表文件。You can format the XML document with either a object or an XSL Transformation style sheet file. 如果不指定任何 XSL 转换文档，则使用默认格式显示 XML 文档。If no XSL Transform document is specified, the XML document is displayed using the default format. 属性用于指定用于格式化 XML 文档写入输出流写入之前 （表示 XSL 转换文档） 的对象。The property is used to specify a object (representing an XSL Transform document) used to format the XML document before it is written to the output stream. > [!NOTE] > 使用对象需要`Full Trust`权限。Using a object requires `Full Trust` permissions. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建和来自示例 XML 文件和一个 XSL 转换样式表的对象。The following code example shows how to create and objects from a sample XML file and an XSL Transformation style sheet. 对象然后由 XML 控件用于显示 XML 文档。The objects are then used by the XML control to display the XML document. [!code-aspx-csharp[XmlClassExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/XmlClassExample/CS/xmlcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[XmlClassExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/XmlClassExample/VB/xmlvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: A that contains a list of optional arguments passed to the style sheet and used during the XSL Transformation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来提供的 XSL 转换样式表，具有可选参数。Use the property to provide the XSL Transformation style sheet with optional arguments. 参数可以是 XSLT 参数或扩展对象。The arguments can be either XSLT parameters or extension objects. 有关使用类，请参阅[样式表参数和扩展对象的 XsltArgumentList](~/docs/standard/data/xml/xsltargumentlist-for-style-sheet-parameters-and-extension-objects.md)。For more information about using the class, see [XsltArgumentList for Style Sheet Parameters and Extension Objects](~/docs/standard/data/xml/xsltargumentlist-for-style-sheet-parameters-and-extension-objects.md).

summary.span: 获取或设置扩展样式表语言转换 (XSLT) 样式表的路径，该样式表在 XML 文档被写入输出流之前对其进行格式化。

span.span: Gets or sets the path to an Extensible Stylesheet Language Transformation (XSLT) style sheet that formats the XML document before it is written to the output stream.

value.span: XSL 转换样式表的路径，该样式表在 XML 文档被写入输出流之前对其进行格式化。

span.span: The path to an XSL Transformation style sheet that formats the XML document before it is written to the output stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用时控件显示的 XML 文档，你可以选择指定格式的 XML 文档写入输出流中两种方式之一前一个 XSL 转换样式表。When using the control to display an XML document, you can optionally specify an XSL Transformation style sheet that formats the XML document before it is written to the output stream in one of two ways. 可以设置格式与 XML 文档对象或使用 XSL 转换样式表文件。You can either format the XML document with a object or with an XSL Transformation style sheet file. 如果指定 XSL 转换的样式表，则使用默认格式显示 XML 文档。If no XSL Transformation style sheet is specified, the XML document is displayed using the default format. 属性用于指定用于格式化 XML 文档写入输出流写入之前 （表示一个 XSL 转换样式表） 的 XSL 转换样式表文件的路径。The property is used to specify the path to an XSL Transformation style sheet file (representing an XSL Transformation style sheet) used to format the XML document before it is written to the output stream. 你可以使用相对或绝对路径。You can use a relative or an absolute path. 相对路径而无需指定完整路径在服务器上相关的 Web 窗体页或用户控件的位置的文件的位置。A relative path relates the location of the file to the location of the Web Forms page or user control, without specifying a complete path on the server. 该路径是相对 Web 页的位置。The path is relative to the location of the Web page. 这使得更轻松地移动整个站点到另一个目录服务器上而无需更新到代码中的文件的路径。This makes it easier to move the entire site to another directory on the server without updating the path to the file in code. 绝对路径提供的完整路径，因此将站点移动到另一个目录时需要更新代码。An absolute path provides the complete path, so moving the site to another directory requires updating the code. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何显示 XML 文档中使用 XSL 转换中控件。The following code example shows how to display an XML document using an XSL Transform in the control. summary.span: 获取或设置用于导航和编辑与 控件关联的 XML 数据的光标模型。

span.span: Gets or sets a cursor model for navigating and editing the XML data associated with the control.
An object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可以用于将关联对象控件。This property can be used to associate an object with the control. 对象创建一个类以实现从接口，如和类。An object is created from a class that implements the interface, such as the and classes. 创建的对象对象是只读的和创建的对象对象可以进行编辑。 objects created by objects are read-only, and objects created by objects can be edited. 使用确定对象的只读或可编辑状态属性类。An object's read-only or editable status is determined using the property of the class.
